sentence: Proposed NC congressional map could put Madison Cawthorn's seat in significant electoral danger: report Raw Story, Matthew Chapman, 2/14/2022 On Monday, writing for Carolina Journal, former North Carolina GOP Executive Director Dallas Woodhouse outlined how a proposed state congressional map to remediate the illegal gerrymander struck down by state courts could affect one district in particular: that of freshman GOP Rep. Madison Cawthorn.
title: DKos Asheville Open Thread: 14th Amendment moves,
